you need to declare the inStream variable.

[tt]private final Stream inStream;[/tt]

or something along the lines of that for your server.

item.title: inStream variable
item.description:
@202685 wrote:

im using an UBER clean delta source (by RandQm) and im adding an ItemOnObject class… but im trying to add the ints

int UsedOnObjectID = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndian(); int UsedOnY = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndianA(); int ItemSlot = (inStream.readSignedWordBigEndianA() - 128); int UsedOnX = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndianA(); int ItemID = inStream.readUnsignedWord();

but when i compile it says it cant find the variable inStream…

ive looked in other deltas, and ive imported the client class and java io and java.util… also i used the damn search bar… help me
